Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

--[[ Fixed by ArceusInator - Works with FE - First person/mouselock no longer breaks everything - Player no longer trips over themselves --]]
local Tool = script.Parent local Blade = Tool.Handle
local RunService = Game:GetService('RunService') local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local SpinAnim local SlashAnim
local LastAttack = 0 local DashTime = 0 local LastKeyDown = 0 local LeftBlade = nil
local Damage = 25
local CritChance = 0.22 local CritMultiplier = 2.25 local ChanceToBreak = 0.20
local BodyGyro
local NumSpinCycles = 168 -- every 42 is 1.05 seconds
local TorsoCFrames_List = {}
local Anims_List = {Tool:WaitForChild('SlashAnim'), Tool:WaitForChild('RightSwingFast'), Tool:WaitForChild('LeftSwingFast')}
local function TagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid and Player then local cTag = Instance.new('ObjectValue') cTag.Name = 'creator' cTag.Value = Player cTag.Parent = humanoid
DebrisService:AddItem(cTag, 1.0) end end
local function CreateBBGui(number, head, critted) wait(0.15) if head and number ~= 0 then local bbGui = Instance.new('BillboardGui') bbGui.Name = 'BoneBillboard' bbGui.Adornee = head bbGui.Parent = head bbGui.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
local tLabel = Instance.new('TextLabel') tLabel.Name = 'Damage' tLabel.Text = math.floor(number) tLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 tLabel.TextScaled = true tLabel.Font = Enum.Font.ArialBold tLabel.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size12 tLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) tLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = 0.5 tLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) tLabel.Parent = bbGui
if critted then tLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) tLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1.4, 0, 1.4, 0) else tLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0.83, 0.45, 0.13) end Spawn(function() local maxHeight = 5.0 while bbGui and bbGui.StudsOffset.Y < maxHeight do bbGui.StudsOffset = bbGui.StudsOffset + Vector3.new(0, 0.2, 0) wait(0.05) end bbGui:Destroy() end) end end
local function Blow(part, hitPart, damage) if part and part.Transparency == 0.0 and hitPart and hitPart.Parent then local humanoid = hitPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hitPart.Parent:IsA('Hat') and hitPart.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hitPart.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') end if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid then local critted = false TagHumanoid(humanoid) if math.random(0, 1) <= CritChance then damage = damage * CritMultiplier critted = true end CreateBBGui(damage, humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild('Head'), critted) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if hitPart and not hitPart.Parent:FindFirstChild("ForceField") and math.random(0, 1) < ChanceToBreak then --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer hitPart:BreakJoints() if hitPart.Name == 'Head' or hitPart.Name == 'Torso' then CreateBBGui(9001, humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild('Head'), critted) Humanoid:TakeDamage(-damage) end end end end end
local function CreateCloneBlade() if LeftBlade == nil then LeftBlade = Blade:Clone() LeftBlade.Transparency = 1.0 LeftBlade.CanCollide = false
local rightArm = Character:WaitForChild('Right Arm') local rightGrip = rightArm:WaitForChild('RightGrip') local leftArm = Character:WaitForChild('Left Arm')
local leftGrip = rightGrip:Clone() leftGrip.Name = 'LeftGrip' leftGrip.Part0 = LeftBlade leftGrip.Part1 = leftArm leftGrip.Parent = leftArm leftGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0, -1.1, -1.1, -1, 0, -8.74227766e-008, 0, 1, 0, 8.74227766e-008, 0, -1)
LeftBlade.Parent = Character end end
local function SpinLikeTheWind() SpinAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SpinAnim) if SpinAnim then SpinAnim:Play() end
if LeftBlade.Transparency == 1.0 then LeftBlade.Transparency = 0.0 else Blade.Transparency = 0.0 end
local oldAutoRotate = Humanoid.AutoRotate Humanoid.AutoRotate = false
BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.P = 100000 BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(BodyGyro.P, BodyGyro.P, BodyGyro.P) BodyGyro.Name = "BG"
TorsoCFrames_List[1] = Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) TorsoCFrames_List[2] = Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) TorsoCFrames_List[3] = Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) TorsoCFrames_List[4] = Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) TorsoCFrames_List[5] = Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) TorsoCFrames_List[6] = Torso.CFrame
BodyGyro.Parent = Torso
Spawn(function() wait(2.1) if SpinAnim then SpinAnim:Play() end end)
for i = 1, NumSpinCycles do local c = i%6 + 1 if BodyGyro then BodyGyro.cframe = TorsoCFrames_List[c] end wait(0.025) end
if BodyGyro then BodyGyro:Destroy() end if LeftBlade.Transparency == 0.0 then LeftBlade.Transparency = 1.0 else Blade.Transparency = 1.0 end
Humanoid.AutoRotate = oldAutoRotate wait(2.0) end
local function UnleashTheInnerBeast(key) key = key:lower() if key == 'w' then local wTime = RunService.Stepped:wait() if (wTime - LastKeyDown < 0.2) then DashTime = wTime end LastKeyDown = wTime end end
local function OnActivated() if not Torso or not Humanoid then return end
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local wTime = RunService.Stepped:wait() if wTime - DashTime < 0.2 then SpinLikeTheWind() else SlashAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Anims_List[math.random(1, #Anims_List)]) if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Play() end end
wait(0.25) Tool.Enabled = true end
local equipped = false local function OnEquipped() if equipped then return end equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Humanoid.Torso if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end CreateCloneBlade() end
Tool.KeyDown.OnServerEvent:connect(function(client, key) if client.Character == Tool.Parent then UnleashTheInnerBeast(key) end end)
local function OnUnequipped() if not equipped then return end equipped = false if SpinAnim then SpinAnim:Stop() end if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Stop() end Blade.Transparency = 0.0
if BodyGyro then BodyGyro:Destroy() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated)
Blade.Touched:connect(function(hitPart) Blow(Blade, hitPart, Damage) end)
